Segment.name: BPR
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of a Payment Order/Remittance Advice Transaction Set and total payment amount, or to enable related transfer of funds and/or information from payer to payee to occur

Field.name: TransactionHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code designating the action to be taken by all parties

Field.name: MonetaryAmount
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: CreditDebitFlagCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

Field.name: PaymentMethodCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the method for the movement of payment instructions

Field.name: PaymentFormatCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the payment format to be used

Field.name: DFIIdNumberQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI)

Field.name: DFIIdentificationNumber1
Field.comment: Depository Financial Institution (DFI) identification number

Field.name: AccountNumberQualifier1
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of account

Field.name: AccountNumber1
Field.comment: Account number assigned

Field.name: OriginatingCompanyIdentifier
Field.comment: A unique identifier designating the company initiating the funds transfer instructions. The first character is one-digit ANSI identification code designation (ICD) followed by the nine-digit identification number which may be an IRS employer identification number (EIN), data universal numbering system (DUNS), or a user assigned number; the ICD for an EIN is 1, DUNS is 3, user assigned number is 9

Field.name: OriginatingCompanySupplementalCode
Field.comment: A code defined between the originating company and the originating depository financial institution (ODFI) that uniquely identifies the company initiating the transfer instructions

Field.name: DFIIdNumberQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI)

Field.name: DFIIdentificationNumber2
Field.comment: Depository Financial Institution (DFI) identification number

Field.name: AccountNumberQualifier2
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of account

Field.name: AccountNumber2
Field.comment: Account number assigned

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: BusinessFunctionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the business reason for this payment

Field.name: DFIIdNumberQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI)

Field.name: DFIIdentificationNumber3
Field.comment: Depository Financial Institution (DFI) identification number

Field.name: AccountNumberQualifier3
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of account

Field.name: AccountNumber3
Field.comment: Account number assigned
